### handleCmp() {#a9dfa7d879ffc886a8014f1c9714ec166}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAPotentialValuesFloating::handleCmp (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp; Cmp, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; LHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; RHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-attributorattributes-cpp-/aapotentialvaluesimpl/iteminfo">ItemInfo</a> II, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-attributorattributes-cpp-/aapotentialvaluesimpl/iteminfo">ItemInfo</a> &gt; &amp; Worklist)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Check if <code>Cmp</code> is a comparison we can simplify.

We handle multiple cases, one in which at least one operand is an (assumed) nullptr. If so, try to simplify it using <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/aanonnull">AANonNull</a> on the other operand. Return true if successful, in that case Worklist will be updated.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l11019">11019</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### handleGenericInst() {#a3de59e829dffdff466e6c22944ac47a8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAPotentialValuesFloating::handleGenericInst (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-attributorattributes-cpp-/aapotentialvaluesimpl/iteminfo">ItemInfo</a> II, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-attributorattributes-cpp-/aapotentialvaluesimpl/iteminfo">ItemInfo</a> &gt; &amp; Worklist)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> the generic, non-optimistic InstSimplfy functionality if we managed to simplify any operand of the instruction <code>I</code>.

Return true if successful, in that case Worklist will be updated.
